metadata.title: Teachers - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: Meet our teaching staff
content_blocks.section: Meet our teaching staff

content_blocks.text: The project-based teaching methodology (PBL) allows us to have a diverse group of teachers, with multiple and complementary specialties, to better guide the students during the projects.Our teachers work in 'teaching teams', whose backgrounds cover the areas of computing, business and leadership, as well as broad specializations such as artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, UX, mathematics, finance, marketing, communication, among others. Our entire teaching staff is made up of Masters and PhDs, which combines academic and market experience, allowing for a constant exchange of knowledge and enriching the students' experience.
